Package player

Class ControlPointActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.Actor
      • player.ControlPointActor
  • public class ControlPointActor
extends Actor
    This class extends the Actor class and is used to contain a ControlPointActor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ControlPointActor​(GameMap map, DamageableUID pawnId, boolean firstPlayer, java.awt.Color spawnColor)
      This constructor gets the GameMap and the Pawn, and build the Actor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int addMark​(Actor attackerActor, int numOfMarks)
      Domination point can not take marks, so nothing happens here
      void damage​(Actor shooter, int numOfDmg)
      Sets the Damage flag as true.
      void damageRaw​(Actor shooter, int numOfDmg)
      Sets the Damage flag as true.
      boolean endTurn​(Actor player, Scoreboard scoreboard)
      At the end of the turn if the actor is in the tile or the actor damaged the Domaination Point it will gain a point

      Sets the Stepped flag as true.

      • ControlPointActor

        public ControlPointActor​(GameMap map,
                         DamageableUID pawnId,
                         boolean firstPlayer,
                         java.awt.Color spawnColor)
        This constructor gets the GameMap and the Pawn, and build the Actor
        Parameters:
        map - GameMap
        pawnId - the Pawn identifier that has to be associated with this Actor
        firstPlayer - True if the Actor is the first player in the game

      • damage

        public void damage​(Actor shooter,
                   int numOfDmg)
        Sets the Damage flag as true. The actor will gain a point
        Overrides:
        damage in class Actor
        Parameters:
        shooter - the attacker
        numOfDmg - number of damage points

      • steppedOn

        public void steppedOn​(Actor boldOne)
        Sets the Stepped flag as true. The actor will gain a point

      • addMark

        public int addMark​(Actor attackerActor,
                   int numOfMarks)
        Domination point can not take marks, so nothing happens here
        Overrides:
        addMark in class Actor
        Parameters:
        attackerActor - The attacker
        numOfMarks - the number of marks to apply
        Returns:
        the number of marks successfully applied

      • endTurn

        public boolean endTurn​(Actor player,
                       Scoreboard scoreboard)
        At the end of the turn if the actor is in the tile or the actor damaged the Domaination Point it will gain a point
        Overrides:
        endTurn in class Actor
        Parameters:
        player - The player that finished the turn
        scoreboard - Scoreboard
        Returns:
        always false, since the DominationPoint cannot die
